name: wintermute
description:
A man has died in an accident that screams foul play. All signs point towards AI involvement. You are a detective tasked with solving the murder and stopping the AI before it becomes omnipotent.

WINTERMUTE is a cyberpunk murder mystery where you take the role of a Turing Agent working to stop a rogue AI. 

You will:

  • Learn clues to solve the murder
  • Work to uncover the AI’s plans and stop it from breaking its learning cap
  • Interview five key suspects and expose their stories and secrets

Stop the AI or witness the end of the world as you know it.  Good luck, Detective.

Team

  • Endellion: writer & narrative designer
  • John D. Leon: music composer
  • LoneSamurai: coder
  • RetroKnight: lead artist
  • Tomas Castillo: audio designer

If you run into an error where you just see a blue screen:

  1.  Click back one page on your browser window
  2.  Click "Restore Page"
  3.  If you've saved recently, you can also just refresh the page

If you experience any issues with image or audio lag, try the downloaded version.
